title: Account Level bugged
body: My account here is listed as lvl 5, so I can't post, or up vote. Yet I've played hundreds of ranked games... IE I'm level 30, the boards think I'm level 5.

replies.body: When you post for the first time, your account might need to sync to the boards.  It looks like your post here has done just that.  Let me know if you still have any issues posting.
